Html:
Hi all,

I already have an open discussion on THAT LINK where I tried to explain my case. I'm so sorry for opening another discussion but I need to.

LWol tried to help me and he has really been helpful in constructing the export page and it works well accept that the whole data is exported. And I think he is busy those days. I want to thank him again here. But what I need to be done is exporting the filtered results.

WHERE AM I NOW?

1- I prepared a page in dreamweaver to display a filterable table and I added a form below (lines 316-324) with 3 hidden fields and a button to go to "exportXLS.php" when clicked.

https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/5326510/C74tables.php

And this is the query I have:
SELECT *
FROM satislar
WHERE satis_satici LIKE v3 AND satis_tarih between v1 and v2
ORDER BY satis_tarih DESC
2- The "exportXLS.php", as you can check from the link below, exports all the rows not the filtered results.

https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/5326510/exportXLS.php

Please, please help this novice in the bog. (A full export page would be really great indeed)

HURRAY, LWol is back and he saved me.

So the case is closed.

Thank you.
